snippet: For the 2013 Guggenheim International Gala honoring the James Turrell and Christopher Wool, the techno DJ Richie Hawtin built an installation that illuminated the rotunda, recalling Turrell’s show last summer.
abstract: For the 2013 Guggenheim International Gala honoring the James Turrell and Christopher Wool, the techno DJ Richie Hawtin built an installation that illuminated the rotunda, recalling Turrell’s show last summer.

headline.main: Art Matters | A Different Kind of Light Show at the Guggenheim
